title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
Introducing the ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit, the ultimate scanning solution for your retail or hospitality business! This sleek, black imager kit comes with a presentation cradle and USB kit, making it easy to connect to your laptop or desktop computer.

Powered by corded electric, USB cable, or 3 AAA batteries, this versatile scanner offers unparalleled flexibility and convenience. With its ergonomic, handheld design and lightweight construction, this scanner is comfortable to use for long periods of time, reducing user fatigue and increasing productivity.

- Scanner Type: 1D/2D Imager
- Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop
- Connectivity Technology: USB Cable
- Power Source: Corded Electric, USB Cable, 3 AAA Batteries
- Number of Batteries: 3
- Battery Type: AAA
- Use Case: General Purpose, Retail, Hospitality

The ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit is packed with advanced features that make it stand out from the competition. Its omni-directional scanning capabilities allow for quick and accurate scanning of barcodes and QR codes from any angle, while its aim line guidance system ensures precise scanning every time.

Pre-configured and ready to use out of the box, this scanner is designed for maximum convenience and ease of use. Its auto-host cables automatically detect and connect to your device, eliminating the need for manual setup and configuration.

Whether you're scanning products at the checkout counter, managing inventory in the warehouse, or tracking shipments in the distribution center, the ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit is the perfect tool for the job. With its rugged construction, reliable performance, and advanced features, this scanner is built to last and designed to deliver exceptional value for your business.

Order yours today and experience the ultimate in scanning technology with the ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit!
